alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Peninsula and Selawik Valley; Chukchi Sea Coast; Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills; Southern Seward Peninsula Coast; St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast; Yukon Delta (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 01 at 10:22AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...High Surf From Shishmaref To Cape Espenberg Through Saturday Morning... ...High Surf From Nome to St Michael Through Late Tonight... ...Elevate Surf At The Bering Strait, St Lawrence Island and the Yukon Delta Today... High surf is occuring along much of the West Coast of Alaska today into tonight, and into Saturday morning over Northwest Alaska. High Surf Advisories have been issued for those areas, and please see those products for updates. Elevated surf at the Yukon Delta, Bering Strait and St Lawrence Island will continue through today.

area.areaDesc: Baldwin Peninsula and Selawik Valley; Chukchi Sea Coast; Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills; Southern Seward Peninsula Coast; St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast; Yukon Delta
